GSD.description:
drivers: usb: host: Fix deadlock in oxu_bus_suspend()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 4187b291a76664a3c03d3f0d9bfadc8322881868. For more details please see the references link.
